short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Galbreath  Sons is your local Lennox dealer proudly offering the finest heating cooling and indoor air quality products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Based in Richmond Hill, Georgia, we are a local family-owned business and have been operating for over 30 years. We serve customers in Bryan, Chatham, Liberty, and Effingham Counties and in some South Carolina areas including Beaufort and Hilton Head. We are your trusted provider of the finest heating, cooling and indoor air quality products. We are at your service 24/7, so call us today to schedule a visit by one of our qualified specialists! 100% customer satisfaction is our goal!
